content:
For those with websites using content translations: Chances are good that the language display in their native names will be back soon(ish).
Testing and feedback is welcome.

See this issue for details: https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4511

Language names not translated to their native names 路 Issue #4511 路 backdrop/backdrop-issues
One thing baffles me: the language names themselves are not translated. With one notable exception: the installer uses the native name. Everywhere else the English names appear (language select lis...
Feedback is welcome! Where would you expect (prefer) the English language name and where the native name?
